snippet: Carolina Hurricanes defenseman Joni Pitkanen sustained a broken heel during a high-speed icing race against the Washington Capitals on Tuesday night.
abstract: Carolina Hurricanes defenseman Joni Pitkanen sustained a broken heel during a high-speed icing race against the Washington Capitals on Tuesday night.

headline.main: Pitkanen's Injury Renews Debate About Icing Rule
headline.print_headline: Injury Renews Debate On Play With Harrowing Past
